nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Visual Guide: Epic Battles

Star Wars Rebels: Visual Guide: Epic Battles (originally titled Star Wars Rebels: The Epic Battle: The Visual Guide) is a DK reference title for Star Wars Rebels, about the Spectres, published on October 6, 2015. It is a follow-up to Star Wars Rebels: The Visual Guide and includes information on both the program's first and second seasons.

Star Wars Rebels™: Visual Guide: Epic Battles is a fact-filled companion to the first and second series of the newest Star Wars animated television series. Star Wars Rebels™ is set between the events of Episodes III and IV, and the Visual Guide depicts all the galactic escapades, interesting vehicles, and fun characters fans have come to love.
